name: Starbase Admiral
description:
A real-time space strategy game with ship customization. Design your own ships, compose your fleet and use it to face off against other players.

You will create your own in-game base with powerplants, refineries and base defences to create a healthy economy. Use resources gathered from asteroids and the local sun to build your pre-designed fleet and vanquish your enemy!

Features
- Resource collecting
- Base building
- Ship customization (add your own modules and weapons)
- Multiplayer
- Smooth and intuitive combat controls
